title: Hawkesbury diploma in dairy technology
creator_credit: John Kingsford-Smith, Kingcroft Productions and New South Wales. Milk Board
brief_description: Describes the contribution being made by the Hawkesbury Agricultural College in the training of personnel for the dairy industry. Presented by the Milk Board of New South Wales.
